bug.author: serhio7
bug.summary: Problem with Kubeflow End to End - GitHub Issue Summarization
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Following tutorial till step kfctl apply k8s -V Every time got cloud shell reconnect and proccess killed <denchmark-code>kfctl apply k8s -V INFO[0002] deploying kubeflow application filename="cmd/apply.go:35" INFO[0002] reading from /home/randomister223/kubeflow-codelab/app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:341" INFO[0002] reading from /home/randomister223/kubeflow-codelab/app.yaml filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:341" INFO[0003] namespace: kubeflow filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:109" Killed </denchmark-code>
Environment: <denchmark-code>$ kfctl version v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e $ ks version ksonnet version: 0.13.1 jsonnet version: v0.11.2 client-go version: kubernetes-1.10.4 </denchmark-code>
